Package com.bsuir.by.nastassia.yankova.nfilm.services

Class FilmService

java.lang.Object
com.bsuir.by.nastassia.yankova.nfilm.services.FilmService
public class FilmService extends Object
The FilmService class provides methods for interacting with film-related data and functionality.

    • updateFilmById

      public void updateFilmById(Integer idFilm, String title, String description, String genre, String duration, String director, Integer releaseYear, String language, String country, Double price, String imageURL) throws ServiceException
      Updates a film by its ID.
      Parameters:
      idFilm - the ID of the film
      title - the new title of the film
      description - the new description of the film
      genre - the new genre of the film
      duration - the new duration of the film
      director - the new director of the film
      releaseYear - the new release year of the film
      language - the new language of the film
      country - the new country of the film
      price - the new price of the film
      imageURL - the new image URL of the film
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs while updating the film

    • addFilm

      public void addFilm(String title, String description, String genre, String duration, String director, Integer releaseYear, String language, String country, Double price, String imageURL) throws ServiceException
      Adds a new film to the database.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the film
      description - the description of the film
      genre - the genre of the film
      duration - the duration of the film
      director - the director of the film
      releaseYear - the release year of the film
      language - the language of the film
      country - the country of the film
      price - the price of the film
      imageURL - the image URL of the film
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs while adding the film to the database

    • deleteFilmById

      public void deleteFilmById(Integer idFilm) throws ServiceException
      Deletes a film from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      idFilm - the ID of the film to be deleted
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs while deleting the film from the database

    • isFilmInFavorites

      public Integer isFilmInFavorites(Integer idFilm, Integer idUser) throws ServiceException
      Checks if a film is in the favorites list of a user.
      Parameters:
      idFilm - the ID of the film
      idUser - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      1 if the film is in the favorites list, 0 otherwise
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs while checking the film in the favorites list

    • getFavoritesList

      public ArrayList<Film> getFavoritesList(Integer idUser) throws ServiceException
      Retrieves the favorites list of a user.
      Parameters:
      idUser - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Film objects in the favorites list
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an error occurs while retrieving the favorites list
